description: Get docker metrics per host and container

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM docker WITH KEY = host
list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM docker WITH KEY = host

list.definition: show tag values  from docker_container_cpu with key = "container_name" WHERE host =~ /$server/
list.name: container
